actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Reaffirming the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and expressing support for "Universal Declaration of Human Rights Day".
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Reaffirms the Universal Declaration of Human Rights (adopted by the United Nations on December 10, 1948) and expresses support for Universal Declaration of Human Rights Day.

titles.title: Reaffirming the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and expressing support for "Universal Declaration of Human Rights Day".
